mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into five_asset_computer (business_key, dept_id, dept_name, user_login, user_name, computer_no, computer_name, computer_brand, security_level, use_way, room, operating_system, operating_system_time, sn_no, hard_disk_no, mac_address, network, ip_address, display_type, cd_type, usb_status, use_time, use_status, remark, use_login, use_name, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end, charge_man, charge_man_name, equipment_no, equipment_type, fixed_asset_no) values (#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{computerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{computerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{computerBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{room,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatingSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatingSystemTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{snNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hardDiskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{macAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{network,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usbStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, #{chargeMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargeManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixedAssetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update five_asset_computer set business_key = #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_login = #{userLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, computer_no = #{computerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, computer_name = #{computerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, computer_brand = #{computerBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, security_level = #{securityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_way = #{useWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room = #{room,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operating_system = #{operatingSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operating_system_time = #{operatingSystemTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sn_no = #{snNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hard_disk_no = #{hardDiskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mac_address = #{macAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, network = #{network,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip_address = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, display_type = #{displayType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cd_type = #{cdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usb_status = #{usbStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_time = #{useTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_status = #{useStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_login = #{useLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_name = #{useName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_process_end = #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, charge_man = #{chargeMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charge_man_name = #{chargeManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equipment_no = #{equipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equipment_type = #{equipmentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fixed_asset_no = #{fixedAssetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, business_key, dept_id, dept_name, user_login, user_name, computer_no, computer_name, computer_brand, security_level, use_way, room, operating_system, operating_system_time, sn_no, hard_disk_no, mac_address, network, ip_address, display_type, cd_type, usb_status, use_time, use_status, remark, use_login, use_name, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end, charge_man, charge_man_name, equipment_no, equipment_type, fixed_asset_no from five_asset_computer where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, business_key, dept_id, dept_name, user_login, user_name, computer_no, computer_name, computer_brand, security_level, use_way, room, operating_system, operating_system_time, sn_no, hard_disk_no, mac_address, network, ip_address, display_type, cd_type, usb_status, use_time, use_status, remark, use_login, use_name, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end, charge_man, charge_man_name, equipment_no, equipment_type, fixed_asset_no from five_asset_computer
order by id desc
